location_info: We are a sports center located in Jyväskylä, far from everything and in the middle of nowhere.
rental_info: You can rent equipment and facilities for various sports and hobbies from us, so you can do anything as long as it's bowling!
login_info: Log in and start using our facilities right away!
come_bowling_info: We have multiple lanes open so even a bigger group will fit in to bowl. Log in a book a lane from here!
